overview: Welcome to Director Paul Norman's Bedlam, the story of a girl and her bed. A bed that gives advice, tells tales, and just might save Celeste from some untold danger.  All in all, it's Bedlam. When all hell breaks loose...and it feels just like heaven.
tagline: Maybe The Walls Don't Have Ears, But The Mattress Talks.
title: Bedlam
